<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/project/comment/{commentid}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the information about a comment with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"commentid","in":"path","description":"Comment ID","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Comment","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"},"ParentId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"},"Page":{"type":"string","example":"Some page"},"Content":{"type":"string","example":"Comment content"},"Author":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"},"DisplayName":{"type":"string","example":"Mike Zanyatski"},"Title":{"type":"string","example":"Manager"},"AvatarSmall":{"type":"string","example":"url to small avatar"},"ProfileUrl":{"type":"string","example":"\\/Products\\/People\\/Profile.aspx?user=administrator"}},"title":"EmployeeWraper"},"LastModified":{"type":"string","example":"2020-12-08T17:37:03.3304954Z"},"Inactive":{"type":"boolean","example":"false"}},"title":"CommentWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
